players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Charlie's death confirms mafia is among us. Diana, why silent? Alice, any thoughts?"
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
You: "Diana is mafia. We must vote her out to win."
Bob: "Alice, if you're the detective, why reveal so early? Diana, defend yourself or we vote you."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
